abs: We consider basic ergodicity properties of adaptive MCMC algorithms under minimal assumptions, using coupling constructions. We prove convergence in distribution and a weak law of large numbers. We also give counter-examples to demonstrate that the assumptions we make are not redundant.
title: Coupling and Ergodicity of Adaptive MCMC
